column2: IDEABKL-6449 Enable ISO-8601 date format via system property

column3: Setting the system property date.iso8601 to true (java -Ddate.iso8601=true), enables the ISO-8601 format in the DateFormatUtil.

I'm not sure whether and how to test this contribution: programmatically setting the system property would have to be done prior to the first access of DateFormatUtil (in all variations of running the tests).
@simon04, please update the PR due to conflicts, cc @klikh.
Done. Please take less than 7 months for reviewing / commenting this PR! (This is not motivating at all for spare-time contributions to open-source projects!)
Finally, the issue has been fixed in 2019.3. It was decided to implement it not as a JVM property, but provide a UI in the Settings.
